headline: Is American Water Works Now a Value Opportunity After Recent Rate Approvals and Acquisitions?
summary: If you are wondering whether American Water Works Company is quietly turning into a value opportunity rather than just a steady utility name for the defensive corner of your portfolio, you are not alone. The stock has edged up just 4.6% year to date and is roughly flat over the last year, which stands in contrast to its negative 3 year and 5 year returns and hints that sentiment might be in the middle of a reset. Recent news flow has centered on American Water Works securing new regulated...
